schema:name: BoE Questionnaire Template
schema:description: A questionnaire template that used by the BoE to collect survey data from 2004 to 2011

columns.name: No.
columns.description: Each question has its own id/number for the respondents to complete the entire questionnaire

columns.name: Variable Name
columns.description: The name of the variable of each question

columns.name: Option Number
columns.description: Each option in the questions has its unique number to be classified and selected
